accomplishedProjects.text:
Here are just some of the projects of GYSNC Solutions successfully undertaken:

- Solution Services
- Tax Mapping Business Intelligence System for Sipocot, Camarines Sur. 2020
- Tax Mapping Business Intelligence System for San Fernando, Camarines Sur. 2020
- Tax Mapping Business Intelligence System for Magarao, Camarines Sur. 2020
- Infrastructure Information Management Business Intelligence System for Carmona, Cavite. 2020

LGU Plans Creation & CCA Alignments Review

- Comprehensive Land Use Plan (CLUP) for Sipocot, Camarines Sur. 2020
- Comprehensive Land Use Plan for (CLUP) Castilla, Sorsogon. 2020
- Validation of Alignments for Resiliency Review of LGU Plans including Comprehensive Land Use Plan, Community Development Plan, and Local Climate Change Action Plan, Pasacao, Camarines Sur. 2020

history.text:
ENGR. OLIVER BELENO BARBOSA
- Founder and CEO, GSYNC Solutions Australia and Philippines GIS and Automation Specialist IT Release and Process Manager. 20 years of experience in both government and private organizations mainly in IT business specializing in GIS and spatial solutions.

Being “Iskolars ng Bayan” at heart, parallel 20 years’ achievements on the separate salient areas of professional geospatial technology practices was catalyzed by our CEO last 2019, who had already migrated to Australia for a decade, to answer a grand yet purposeful calling and challenge.

GSYNC Solutions is registered and based in Australia to focus on the Geospatial Solutions product ensuring this is in touch with the latest in the technology and information system solutions and services that first world countries have to offer, including software architecture and approaches and methodologies which will be rolled out to client countries including the Philippines. Immediate planned rollout targets are Australia itself, Malaysia, and France.

GSYNC Solutions Philippines is registered and based in the Philippines to focus on Geospatial Solution Services, structured to overcome identified challenges of how the technology and related technical and consultancy services can be used to benefit the communities. It incorporates GSYNC Engineering Consultancy and GSYNC Business Consultancy Services.

natureOfBusiness.text: GSYNC Solutions Philippines, OPC is a consulting, engineering, technical, environmental and solutions services company syncing the right professionals and experts needed for effective, sustainable and affordable location intelligence solutions and applications.

onlinePayment.text: Yes. It is available and perform using Online secure payment facility, shopping cart style.

ourServices.text:
We provide technical project services on telecommunications, water resources, environmental studies, coastal engineering, structural engineering and civil works, construction management and geotechnical engineering.

policy.text:
Business policies are in place to ensure that we guide, direct and protect both the company and its employees.

Our initial policies include:
- Customer Quality Policy
- Credit Policy
- Ethics & Conduct Policy
- Employment Policies
- Nondiscrimination Policies
- Compensation and Benefits Policies
- Internet, Email, & Cyber-security Policy
- Misconduct Policy, Purchasing Policy, and Workplace Safety Policy.

visionAndMission.text:
Vision

GSYNC Solutions Philippines, OPC envision a smart, resilient and sustainable Philippines composed of smart cities, smart municipalities, and smart businesses servicing happy positive resilient communities.

Mission
GSYNC Solutions Philippines, OPC aims to achieve the following:

 - Bring global, client-focused knowledge, practices and location intelligence solutions to the Philippines through localized services and synergy of professionals
 - Be the first choice in geospatial technology solutions and related services.
 - Make everyone’s life easier and better by creating more effective and efficient organizations and individuals.
